Rotation.RotationNotes: Right Shift to Toggle between Single and AoE Rotation *be sure to have both rotations on the rotation list* Right Ctrl to Toggle between Cooldowns ON, OFF, or BOSS ONLY Right Alt to Toggle between Auto or Manual Symbiosis Cast (not fully implemented yet)
